channel.title: First Post on Sc0rpi0n's Journey

item.title: Welcome to My Journey
item.description: Hello Everyone, I am Nikhil Maan aka Sc0rpi0n101. I am a Junior at Amity University, Noida with a Computer Science Major . I am currently creating a C and Fortran Parser for SymPy as a GSoC 2019 project. Welcome to my life and be ready to travel with me in my Journey in the tech and the open-source world. This blog will also serve as the blog for my GSoC 2019 Project Blog.
